data.approach: Converted hardcoded oklch colors to Tailwind opacity modifiers (e.g., text-base-content/60, bg-success/10). Kept CSS for: box-shadow, linear-gradient, filter:drop-shadow (not replaceable). Reduced CSS from ~400 lines to ~150 lines.
